short_description: Chat with AI that aids in stock analysis and implements trading strategies.
business_goal: Empower Chinese retail investors using AI
key_features: AI analyses key stock indicators like ROE, P/E
AI assists traders in strategy implementation and backtesting

project_timeline.09.2023: Alpha release: Analysis of 300 Chinese stocks
project_timeline.12.2023: Beta release: Analysis of 5000 Chinese stocks
project_timeline.2024 Q1: Official release: Includes trading strategies and backtest features
